SELECT DISTINCT t1.id as shopId,1 as activityId,t1.`name`, case when t2.status=1 then t1.icon_url else t1.logo end as image, t1.sort,t1.activityId as rid FROM (SELECT s.id,s.`name`,s.`icon`,s.`type`,i.`id` as activityId,i.`sort` ,a.`icon_url` ,a.`logo` FROM af_boluome_activity_items a join `af_shop` s on a.`ref_id` = s.`id` join af_boluome_activity_items i on s.`id` = i.`ref_id` and i.`boluome_activity_id` =1000 WHERE a.boluome_activity_id = 1000) t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT IF(o.sec_type = 'HUAFEI' OR o.sec_type = 'LIULIANG', 'CHONGZHI', o.sec_type) AS type,1 as status from af_boluome_rebate t JOIN af_order o on o.id = t.order_id WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} AND o.is_delete = 0 AND t.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY o.sec_type) t2 on t1.type = t2.type ORDER BY `sort` ;
